channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: All of it, all at once
item.description: The smartphone is the most expensive device most people own, and the one they use the most. Here’s everything you can’t have, can’t afford and won’t g...

item.title: Hong Kong Crypto Unicorn Hashkey Secures $30 Million From Early PDD Investor Gaorong
item.description: Beijing-based Gaorong Ventures’ investment values the crypto exchange operator at nearly $1.5 billion post-money.

item.title: Found, Lost & Found: Sweden’s Climate Leadership Ambitions
item.description: Sweden’s climate emissions are rising, after a long decrease. Political promises of cheaper fossil fuels are to blame - but EU demands can but Sweden ...

item.title: Time well spent
item.description: Doing what? When we choose which job to apply for, what career to commit to, which business to start, it might be worth a moment (or a few moments) to...

item.title: Apple Refurbished Mac mini Is Now Ridiculously Cheap
item.description: Apple drops the price of a refurbished Mac mini to just over $300, making it cheaper than ever to become a Mac owner.

item.title: ProtoArc XKM01 CaseUp Combo Is An Office That Packs Up Into A Case
item.description: Digital nomads or occasional home workers could find the ProtoArc XKM01 CaseUp Combo a possible alternative to the cramped keyboard and trackpad on ma...

item.title: What’s That Bright Star? See Venus At Its Brilliant Best: The Night Sky This Week
item.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also applies to northern hemisphere mid-northern latitudes).

item.title: “Usualing”
item.description: This is not a real word, but it’s useful nonetheless. When we default to doing what we did without examining our options, we’re ‘usualing.’ It’s a hel...

item.title: “I’ve got your back”
item.description: This is a complicated promise. It’s about commitment and connection and most of all, time. If we’re saying that we’ll do what’s in our short-term inte...

item.title: Ensemble stars
item.description: Over the last 50 years, 167 different people have been part of the Saturday Night Live ensemble cast. Some of them went on to become comedy superstars...
